short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifed when PnKllr goes live or does a giveaway!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display a countdown timer for PnKllr's next stream! If he is live at any time that countdown will change to a notification letting you know what he is playing!
This will also alert you when PnKllr also does a give away, so if you want to be in it to win it be sure to add this to your browser today!
